name: Outro
_source: music;13- Truth Despair and Hope Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Innes;No need to panic.|My soldiers pursue Prince Lyon's trail.|Our trackers are excellent.|They'll have him soon.
speak;Innes;There's something I need to speak with you about.|The messenger I sent to Frelia returned not long ago.|She brought a package I'd requested:|Frelia's Sacred Twins.
speak;Innes;Yes.|Frelia may have lost her Sacred Stone...|However, it seems the Sacred Twin relics remained undisturbed.|I had them brought here.|Behold!
speak;Innes;Frelia's Sacred Twins.|Nidhogg, the Serpent Bow, and Vidofnir, the Winged Lance.|I want you to take them.
speak;Eirika;These are for you, aren't they?|They're for the rulers of Frelia.
speak;Innes;No, I entrust them to your care.|You're the leader of this army.|Use them as you see fit.
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Prince Innes...|I appreciate your sacrifice.
speak;Innes;It is no sacrifice, and I require no thanks.|We're fighting for the same thing here.|Victory.
speak;Woman1;Lady Syrene!|Thank you!|We all owe you our gratitude...
speak;Syrene;No, it wasn't my doing.|We prevailed because of superior leadership.
speak;OldMan1;We owe you a debt of gratitude that can never be repaid.|It's not much, but please accept this staff as a small token.
